page.title: 16GAMES JULIA PLAYS AT SCHOOL.
page.content: We decided to interview a pupil called Julia who lives in our D-block.We chose her because she was very interesting.She gets up about 8.30 or 8.35.She comes to school in a coach. When she gets to school she plays with two of her friends and these are the things she does at break;walks around,plays catch,polo, and other games.This is how you play Polo.It is a game where one person is 'IT' she calls somone up to her and gives them a subject such as 'Trees'. so the girl goes back to the group of people and tells them the subject.The girl shouts out all the things and the person who's 'IT' shouts out one of the trees.The first person back is 'IT'. Julia's favourite subjects are spelling,poems,English.There is no-one to play when she first arrives.She goes home in a taxi.
